text: "All That She Wants" is a hit single from Swedish pop group Ace of Base. It was released in 1992 from their debut album, Happy Nation. The song hit #2 in the United States. It was also at the top of the charts in Germany, Australia, Canada, United Kingdom and Denmark. The song was very popular in 1993. It is a Europop song written and produced by band members Jonas Berggren (Joker) and Ulf Ekberg (Buddha), with additional production by Dag Krister Volle. The longest version was 7 minutes and 58 seconds long. Category:1992 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Ace of Base songs
title: All That She Wants
